direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle index-based operations on the list, with similar growth behavior and exception handling.
Both methods perform index-based operations that may involve growing the list if the index is greater than the current size.
The growthList method creates instances of GrowthList, which includes the set method, indicating a direct dependency.
Both methods use the nCopies method from Collections to fill gaps in the list, indicating similar resource access patterns.
